author: sky.cactus
content: Can one of the authors of 1559 please review <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3031>?

author: tkstanczak
content: can we add GASPREMIUM and BASEFEE?

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm not opposed to either opcode, though I will argue against the term `GASPREMIUM` as I believe it to be mildly deceitful wording that exists for public relations reasons, and I am generally against public relation stuff bleeding into code.

author: sky.cactus
content: Or to put it more specifically, I think MINER_BRIBE more accurately describes what that variable is, and we should prefer a more accurate variable name over a less accurate variable name.

author: tkstanczak
content: BRIBE has connotation of illegal deed so it is wrong

author: tkstanczak
content: but then it is PREMIUM so GASPREMIUM

author: sky.cactus
content: Hmm, I suppose bribe does come with negative connotation.  I would accept an alternative word there that is not negative but still clearly asserts that "this is the money you are going to pay to the miner in order to incentivize them to include your transaction".

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm not a fan of tip, because it isn't really optional at all.

author: sky.cactus
content: Tip implies that it you can give it or not, and the miners will still serve you.

author: sky.cactus
content: `MINER_FEE` would work for me, I think that aligns pretty closely with what it is.
